Cutie doesn't want to look like a sap, but doesn't
want to start the whole thing back by not being peace
minded. It occurs to him the other bot might have
realized he's stuck and doesn't want to risk any more
damage or waste any more ammo on a bot who's as good
as slaged any way. So he holds out his hand to shake
still not letting down his rifle.
